WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
RED FLARE SIGHTED IN 17-08.4N 060-29.66W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FORT DE FRANCE.
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
